mapper.insert: INSERT INTO preference (email, genre1, genre2, genre3, area1, area2, area3) VALUES (#{email}, #{genre1}, #{genre2}, #{genre3}, #{area1}, #{area2}, #{area3}) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE genre1 = VALUES(genre1), genre2 = VALUES(genre2), genre3 = VALUES(genre3), area1 = VALUES(area1), area2 = VALUES(area2), area3 = VALUES(area3)
mapper.select: SELECT p.poster, p.play_id, p.stage_id, s.stage_name, p.play_name, p.play_start, p.play_end, p.genre_name, ( CASE WHEN (s.address LIKE CONCAT(#{area1}, '%') AND p.genre_name = #{genre1}) THEN 0.5 WHEN (s.address LIKE CONCAT(#{area1}, '%') AND p.genre_name = #{genre2}) THEN 0.4 WHEN (s.address LIKE CONCAT(#{area1}, '%') AND p.genre_name = #{genre3}) THEN 0.3 WHEN (s.address LIKE CONCAT(#{area2}, '%') AND p.genre_name = #{genre1}) THEN 0.35 WHEN (s.address LIKE CONCAT(#{area2}, '%') AND p.genre_name = #{genre2}) THEN 0.3 WHEN (s.address LIKE CONCAT(#{area3}, '%') AND p.genre_name = #{genre1}) THEN 0.25 WHEN (s.address LIKE CONCAT(#{area2}, '%') AND p.genre_name = #{genre3}) THEN 0.2 WHEN (s.address LIKE CONCAT(#{area3}, '%') AND p.genre_name = #{genre2}) THEN 0.15 WHEN (s.address LIKE CONCAT(#{area3}, '%') AND p.genre_name = #{genre3}) THEN 0.1 ELSE 0 END * 100 ) AS score FROM play p JOIN stage s ON p.stage_id = s.stage_id WHERE ( (#{area1} IS NOT NULL AND s.address LIKE CONCAT(#{area1}, '%')) OR (#{area2} IS NOT NULL AND s.address LIKE CONCAT(#{area2}, '%')) OR (#{area3} IS NOT NULL AND s.address LIKE CONCAT(#{area3}, '%')) ) AND ( (#{genre1} IS NOT NULL AND p.genre_name = #{genre1}) OR (#{genre2} IS NOT NULL AND p.genre_name = #{genre2}) OR (#{genre3} IS NOT NULL AND p.genre_name = #{genre3}) ) AND p.state = '공연중' ORDER BY CASE WHEN (s.address LIKE CONCAT(#{area1}, '%') AND p.genre_name = #{genre1}) THEN 1 WHEN (s.address LIKE CONCAT(#{area1}, '%') AND p.genre_name = #{genre2}) THEN 2 WHEN (s.address LIKE CONCAT(#{area2}, '%') AND p.genre_name = #{genre1}) THEN 3 WHEN (s.address LIKE CONCAT(#{area1}, '%') AND p.genre_name = #{genre3}) THEN 4 WHEN (s.address LIKE CONCAT(#{area2}, '%') AND p.genre_name = #{genre2}) THEN 5 WHEN (s.address LIKE CONCAT(#{area3}, '%') AND p.genre_name = #{genre1}) THEN 6 WHEN (s.address LIKE CONCAT(#{area2}, '%') AND p.genre_name = #{genre3}) THEN 7 WHEN (s.address LIKE CONCAT(#{area3}, '%') AND p.genre_name = #{genre2}) THEN 8 WHEN (s.address LIKE CONCAT(#{area3}, '%') AND p.genre_name = #{genre3}) THEN 9 ELSE 10 END, score DESC;
